author: reto
msg: Using java.util.Arrays instead of scala.actors.threadpool.Arrays. Removed dependencies.

author: julianfoad
msg: Correct some cases where a 2-URL merge could fail to sleep for timestamps or
not close the RA sessions as early as it should. I did not observe these as
actual problems, but merely saw the potential in the code and corrected the
(merge_locked): Clean up the clean-up code after a 2-URL merge so that we
always sleep for time stamps if needed and always clear the session pool.

author: cutting
msg: AVRO-1250. Add a command-line tool to concatenate data files.  Contributed by Nick White.

msg: CMS commit to openoffice by robweir
